page.title: 08SKIPPING
page.content:
You need three or more players usually girls and a long rope. Two people turn it. The other player jumps in and as soon as the rope comes near their feet they jump over it and carry on like that. As you turn the rope say a rhyme like this:
" Fudge, Fudge tell the judge Susie's gonna have a baby. How many doctors will she need?"
At the end of the rhyme the two people turning the rope turn it as fast as they can. The person tries to jump it and counts out the number until she is caught out. The person with the highest score is the winner.
